transcript:
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Hello. Mausam ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Good afternoon sir, Ajeet baat kar raha hun IndiaMART head office se. Ji boliye. Vaibhav Krishna Mishra aapke account manager hain, unko aapne call kiya tha sir. Us koi issue aa raha hai aapko?
Customer: Nahi nahi issue to sirf wo tha ki thoda sa jaise temple fountain hai na, show nahi ho raha. Lead show nahi ho raha temple ka? Haan temple fountain mein show nahi ho raha, baki to chal raha hai.
Executive: Haan haan. Wo jaise jab bhi active ho rahe hain, din mein ya kabhi bhi, to wo keh ke temple ka dikh nahi raha hai, wo station ka in sab cheezon ka aa raha hai. Marble temple ki aap baat kar rahe hain, right?
Customer: Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Marble temple mein kya issue hai sir, main aapko bata deta hun. Ye high sold item kehte hain. High sold item matlab ki jo bhi koi lead aati hai, to within 20 to 30 second ye sold out ho jati hai sir.
Customer: Bas wohi dikkat ho rahi hai.
Executive: Haan to iske liye aapko proper na aapko system pe IndiaMART login karke aur page ko bar bar refresh karna hoga sir. Jisse ki koi bhi lead aaye to aapko dikhe. Kyunki wahan pe ek option de rakha hai hum logon ne, past lead ka sir. Past lead mein jab aap ja kar dekhenge na, to daily basis pe aapko dikhega marble temple ka 10 se 12 lead aati hai sir IndiaMART pe daily. Hmm. Aur white marble temple ka aap mila lenge to lagbhag 20 lead aati hai daily basis pe.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: To haan lekin iske liye aapko continue system pe kyunki aapke ye thoda sa competition isme jyada hai marble temple mein. To lead aati hai sir lekin 20 se 30 second mein sold out ho jati hai.
Customer: Ek fountain ka bhi hai thoda sa dikkat.
Executive: Marble fountain ka? Ji sir. Marble fountain mein bhi haan same hi issue hai. Uska reason kya hai ki marble fountain mein thoda sa lead flow kam hai sir. Usme daily ka lagbhag chhe ya saat lead aati hai. Thik hai to ek bar to aapko agar aap system pe active rahne lagenge na continue, to fir aapko lead sari hi dikhne lagenge. Aur aap purchase bhi kar payenge easily. Jaise abhi main aapko bata raha hun 50 minute pahle marble statuary fountain ka ek lead aaya tha Ludhiana Punjab se. Haan. 5 feet height white marble material mang rahe the. Lekin aap us time online nahi rahe to ye lead purchase nahi kar paye sir.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan to time aap badha sakte hain kya? Haan bataiye. Wo wohi cheez hai isme pure din mein ek aadmi baitha rahe tabhi kam kuch ho payega iska. Haan agar ek aadmi baith jaye to aap pura hi lead purchase kar payenge sir. Fir to aapko lead hi kam padne lagegi. Kyunki lead ka flow IndiaMART pe kam nahi hai. IndiaMART pe flow sahi hai. Bas ye hai ki aap hi ye lead aur wohi ek minute ke andar 20-30 second mein wo sold out ho jati hai. To aapko pata bhi nahi chalta ki kab lead inquiry aayi aur kab wo chali bhi gayi, khatam ho gayi.
Customer: Haan wohi cheez ho rahi hai bas.
Executive: Aap kitna time de pa rahe hain IndiaMART portal pe? Kab time dete hain aap?
Customer: Jab bhi jaise kabhi bhi phone se active kar liya.
Executive: Achcha achcha aur phone mein hi maximum use karte hain mostly time? Haan bilkul bilkul. Ye ek issue aa raha hai sir kyunki phone mein aap kabhi kabhar login karte hain aur refresh karte hain to us time lead aapko dikhti nahi hai. Kabhi kabhar ek do dikhti bhi hogi. Ek do aap purchase bhi kar lete honge.
Customer: Haan bas wohi ho raha hai.
Executive: Haan nahi to marble temple ka aapko proper lead chahiye to aapko sir proper ek aadmi baithna padega system leke ya mobile app pe aur continue page refresh karna hoga sir.
Customer: Thik hai sir main aisa karta hun ki dekhunga. Haan.
Executive: Iske alawa bhi koi issue hai aapko? Kahin problem aa rahi hai? Nahi nahi baki Vaibhav ji pura follow kar rahe hain. Bahut achcha hai feedback rahega unka.
Customer: Achcha thik hai. Baki ek cheez aur tha ki jaise aapne call kiya tha na miss call ho gaya tha to ek ticket open ho gaya tha sir yahan IndiaMART pe. To ticket ko close kar dun main? Haan kar dijiye.
Executive: Okay thik hai. Thank you. Thik hai so.
summary:
Concerns:

- Temple fountain leads not showing.

- Marble fountain leads not showing.



Resolution:

- Explained high sold item concept.

- Advised to refresh page frequently on system.

- Informed about past lead option.

- Suggested to have dedicated person for leads.

- Agreed to close the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try suggested solutions.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, marble temple, fountain, sold out, refresh
